hReview-aggregate 3b - Extracting item photo test without url

This page was designed to test the extraction of an item photo without url from an hReview-aggregate. It is tested to make sure it can be extracted separately because of an earlier implementation bug that affected hReview and could potentially affect hReview-aggregate.

Inspired by: Glenn Jones' Microformat Test Suite

Author: Lawrence Woodman (vLife Systems)

Tests

Test Result Comment
hreviewaggregate[0].item.photo IsEqualTo("http://example.com/photos/crepes.png") photo is a singular value

History

  • Created: 20 September 2011 by Lawrence Woodman

hReview-aggregate

This review was adapted from: http://microformats.org/wiki/hreview#Restaurant_reviews

Crepes on Cole

Crepes on Cole is awesome

Rated 5 out of 5 based on 6 ratings and 3 reviews.
